options.name: maxWidth
options.description: Width at which to auto-disable plugin

methods.name: defaults
methods.description: Extends plugin default settings; effects instances created hereafter.

name: Navigation
description: A jQuery plugin for simple responsive navigation.
use:
### Basic Navigation will automatically turn a basic navigation into a mobile friendly system. Links can be styled independently: ``` $("nav").navigation(); ``` ```
Home About Contact
``` ### Breakpoint By default, Navigation will enable itself on screens smaller then 980 pixels wide. Specify a different width by setting the `maxWidth` option on initialization. ``` $("nav").navigation({ maxWidth: "740px" }); ``` #### IE Support When supporting IE, a [HTML5 enabler](https://gist.github.com/benplum/8045366) and matchMedia polyfill ([IE 8](https://gist.github.com/benplum/8045336), [IE 9](https://gist.github.com/benplum/8045327)) are required.
